content.description:
Directions: You will now listen to several selections. Each selection will be followed by a series of questions based on the content. Select the best answer to each question from among the four choices.

NOW GET READY TO LISTEN TO THE SELECTION.

choices.label: Er brachte das Rettungsfloß bis zur Küste.
Er zog den Hubschrauber an Land.
Er warnte ihn vor gefährlichen Strömungen.
Er holte andere Delphine zu Hilfe.

content.answer: Er brachte das Rettungsfloß bis zur Küste.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
